Oh, I wonder what I could rant about. Like MAYBE THE NEW POINTLESS STUFF WITH MESSING UP THE COMMENTS AND THREADS. Cut the frills and put it back the way it was. -_- You don't have to fix something that wasn't broken.

So, I wanna send Christmas cards. :DD But uh, I don't know if you'd actually get them exactly on time but I WOULD send them out before Christmas. :DD Actually for postcards outside Europe, I'll have to post them before next Monday. XD And before like the 12th inside Europe. XD

BUT YES, WHO WANTS A CHRISTMAS/HOLIDAY/REGULAR CARD IF YOU DON'T CELEBRATE CHRISTMAS? :DDD XD

Just leave me a comment with like your info. All comments are screened and all that. :D

Made by Think of this as a template. If you want to skip a question, go ahead. If you want to add your own questions or just ramble on about bandom or fanfiction, feel free! Just do a podcast or a voice post or whatever you can to get your voice on the internets for all of us to hear. 1. What's your username and is there a story behind it? 2. Where are you from and where do you live now? 3. What are you wearing? Yes, I am hitting on you. 4. How long have you been in bandom? How did you get into it? 5. Which bands are your favorites? 6. Which band members are your favorites? 7. Have you seen any of them in concert? Any fun stories or memories to share? 8. Do you have an OTP? What is it, and why do you love it? 9. What story do you wish someone would write? 10. Are you working on something for bandom right now? Tell us a little bit about it. 11. You've got fic open somewhere on your computer right now, don't lie. So go to one of your open tabs or word documents or whatever, and read us a couple of lines. 12. Say these words: Iero, haberdashery, LOLcat, flist, dirigible, halcyon, nemesis, ephemeral, languorous /o\ Okay, so I babble a lot and possibly pronounce things wrong, and might mumble at times and just go into tangents but still bandom related usually. But uh, enjoy. :DDDD Also I talk a lot with my hands so this audio thing is weird because you totally miss that shit. XD I'd need to be in video or something. hahah. XD Bandom Voice meme (lol oh dear gods) by telldebatz

So a while back MCR did that thing #SINGitforjapan. And like you could obviously buy the new version of Sing, or/and like a t-shirt or one of 200 prints of a photo I think Frank took in Japan. I got one of those (apparently nr. 27), and today I went to get it at the post office (it was slightly delayed, but they let us know so I was like *shrugs*) and yes, it was in a cardboard tube so it wasn't fucked up at all. (I hate when that happens. ugh. I mean the gets fucked up, obviously. lol.) Bought some food to eat because seriously haven't eaten anything since I woke up. lol. Oooops. XD Anyways when I got home I opened and my bros were like what is it, what is it? My bro made a joke it was plumbing, or o_O a bomb. So I went all 'yeah, it's a pipebomb.' idek. XD Not a funny thing to make a joke about, but ya know. Anyways then I got the thing open and the Print is totally awesome, obviously. Otherwise I wouldn't have bought it. lol. I'mma frame it and I've always known where to hang that damn thing since I first bought it. XD Even tho that covers the sigs on the back. lol. When I bought it it just said it'd be numbered and signed by Frank. BUT it was signed by ALL of them. :D But I had no idea what their sigs even look like so I was all *scratches head* and the only one I knew was Mikey's because it just says MIKEY. XD It's kinda like how I write, except a little nicer. lol. Then I took the pics below and put 'em on my Tumblr and the sig pic was like on the side. But eventually with the help of Twitter fronds, we managed to figure out which is which. XD There's Mikey, then Gerard next to him and Under Mikey is Ray (which I thought was Ray so hah I got him right at least) and then Frank under Gerard (and yes, lol my mind went ~there XD) Apparently Frank doesn't even write fast to get that scribble, he really concentrates on it. Or so I'm told. rofl. Adorbs weirdo. :') So I am very, very happy. But in need of food and a frame for mah print. :D

So... I love this. And like if you can, you can buy this version on iTunes and 100% of the profits of the song goes to like Red cross Japan, I'm pretty sure. :33 All the info is at the end of the video and at singitforjapan.com. Also if you can't buy the song (like me D: unless I find someone willing to gift it to me or something) you can if ya want buy a T-shirt. There was this print of a photo Frank Iero (bandmember) took in Japan. They were 200, signed by him and numbered. But he says they're sold out already. (I got one. XD) All the profits of those things also go 100% to Japan. I love this band. Like a lot. <3_<3

from northern Ethiopia: thank you, Adam Lambert and fans. from charity: water (special donors) on Vimeo.

In January 2011, Adam Lambert gave up his 29th birthday and asked for donations instead of gifts -- he shattered mycharity: water records and with his dedicated fans, raised more than $290,000, all for clean water projects.

Thank you, Adam Lambert and your incredible community of support.

charitywater.org

AWESOME. :DD Unf unf, Gerard. That neck. That hair. mmhhhmmm. Mikey. Omg, you're such a dork. It's adorbs. Frank, you're seriously cuuuutee. Kinda actually tho like a puppy I'd like to pet. o_o And Ray. lol. Sorry, Ray. But your lips are still insane.

Adam (and his guitarist Monte on guitar) singing with these kids in a LA school that got funded because of the Donorschoose.com thing from last summer or soemthing. Just awww, awww. OMG. <3_<3 And the pics from the thing was sooo cute too. And just awww. Really. And just aww, all the kids helped. Donated: $294,736 Donors: 2,319 Students Reached: 231,690 That's all the fangroups combined and I think also the stuff that was being donated even after the competition part was over. <3333 Oh, also what people donated for his 28th birthday, as well. :D

I have three vids to show ya! Aren't you all just so excited? XD First up is called Daylight Breaks by Cassidy Hayley <3_<3. Gotta admit I haven't heard a lot of stuff, but he's damn awesome. I also love this song/vid. AND then there's Adam Lambert's new video for his 2nd Single that's called Whatya Want From Me:
Adam Lambert - New Music - More Music Videos
YouTube if the MTV Player isn't workin for ya: It'll be added to his webpage on Monday. It's been played a lot on VH1 today. XD He's also a presenter of some Award at some Awards show that is on VH1 tonight. XD You can see it on these webpages: MTV, VH1 and BWE.tv AND then there's this band in like New York or something who made like their version of WWFM and made a vid to it before his vid came out and I think is really, really awesome. :D Also if you like their version you can send them a message on YT and ask for the mp3 and they'll send it to ya in E-mail. :D \o/ That 3rd vid gives a warm, fuzzy feeling. XD But I looovee Adam's vid too. It's just <3_<3 all around for these vids. lol.

As said on Whedonesque.com:

Whedon said that this episode marks the point where Dollhouse shifts from stand-alone episodes to a more serialized format of storytelling.

This episode is written by Joss Whedon and directed by David Straiton (he's done House, Charmed, Angel, Dark Angel, Dawson's Creek, La Femme Nikita, Higher Ground [loved that show] and loads of other stuff.).

Also I think I've read around places that this is where FOX figured out that it's better to just let them do their thing and stop fucking with their shit! Thankfully they seem to have figured that out pretty quickly. lol.

Only thing is it coincides with the whole two hour series finale of BSG. BAD. But ya know, still. FOX betetr know no matter what they do the ratings will slip because I bet even Joss Whedon will be watching the BSG finale. lmao.

But whatever, people should just WATCH DOLLHOUSE.

I really want to know what's about the flowers in a vase and the third one being green. Hmm. Because really, you don't get naturally green flowers. You have to put like dye in water and let a white flower soak it up or something.
COME ON, PEOPLE. I love Barney, but Dean's gotta kick his butt!

Peaople, people!! We need some votes for Dean in the final four!!

He is up against Spike!

But as I've said if I can stab Ten in the back for Dean, I can damn well do it (and did) to Spike! I hope you can too. ;)

And vote Barney against House!! Because 1) Barney is awesome and 2) you'll feel better about stabbing Spike in the bacl because NPH played Dr. Horrible/Billy in Dr. Horrible's Sing-Along Blog. ;)

If anyone hasn't voted already, you should go on over and vote because it's really damn close and as much as I love Ten I don't want him to beat Dean:

Hey if you wanna listen to a Radio show that's just about Dollhouse? Then follow this linky: Click-y I'm listening already and it's cool so far. :D Tomorrow or something it's gonna be a podcast you can download, but wheee, live-ish. XD
It's a very special episode of today's "End of Show". It's pure Dollhouse on the radio. You'll hear from Joss, Eliza, Tahmoh, Fran, Dichen, Enver, Olivia and Harry. Plus you will get a chance to listen to scenes from the first episode of Dollhouse as well. The show kicks off at 7pm GMT (2pm EST).

Okay, so I fnally gave up and fell asleep somewhere close to 4 and now I wake up around 6:20-something, and everything is just over. XD And just OMG!!! OMG Yay!!! Yay!! :D Congrats, congrats!!! Woho. :D EDIT: That prop 8 that banned gay marriage in California seems to have passed though, and stuff in other states. Which blows kinda for people living there. :( Kinda makes me not as happy. I mean this is awesome and all, but still. I really thought maybe California wouldn't let it pass. *Sigh* EDIT: Maybe there's hope yet. :) Last knew, it was too close to call. *Crosses fingers it won't pass*

So I bumped across this on my f-list and thought I'd share it if you didn't see it on your f-list. :D Hopefully, on Tuesday, Californians will be voting down a proposition that will take away the right to gay marriage that was legalized by the California Supreme Court not that long ago. I just posted links to some videos here. In addition, I think we as part of the SGA fandom and any other fandoms who want to join (please post this around), should take a moment to write some drabbles on the theme of gay marriage. Get ourselves pumped up and maybe donate, or at least chip in. For everyone who writes a drabble or a fic as a comment to this post today, I'll donate a five dollars to the campaign, up to $150 (it would be a lot more if I wasn't a graduate student, trust me). If anyone else wants to make a similar pledge, let me know and I'll add you. Thanks and I look forward to reading your drabbles. I know some of you do drabbles, and I thought you might like this. :D The place to go then is here --> Click me!
Heh. :D I especially like what NPH says. It's short and sweet. "I vote because I fell in love and I want it to matter."
